content: This is an opportunity to take part in something amazing! The cryptocurrency exchange market is the most lucrative industry in which to operate. This holds true in both bull and bear markets. The thing is, exchanges that are fully centralized are ineffective. Your account is frozen and your funds are held when there are problems with the liquidity. You maintain control of your private keys with Biokript. You have complete control over your funds with Biokript.What is Biokript? Biokript is the next-generation cryptocurrency exchange, and our primary objective is to provide a profitable, efficient, and Shariah-compliant hybrid cryptocurrency exchange for everyone in a most decentralized manner. With our Biokript token, we‚Äôll offer exchange profits based on Mudarabah (Profit Sharing) principles (50/50) to all prospective token holders as well as significant fee discounts on all trades. There will be 500,000,000 tokens produced by Biokript. The first time the token's value doubles, it will perform an initial 5% token burn. The dynamic burn will be 4%, 3%, 2%, and 1% for the second and subsequent times the value doubles. The burn rate will remain constant when the burn rate reaches 1%.FeaturesBIOKRIPT TOKEN ALLOCATION :LinksWebsite: www.biokript.comWhitepaper: www.biokript.com/whitepaperCommunityTwitter: www.twitter.com/biokriptTelegram:https://t.me/biokriptFacebook: www.facebook.com/biokriptInstagram: www.instagram.com/biokriptReddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/_Biokript

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: Biokript's partnership with Microsoft is a monumental collaboration that propels Biokript to new heights in the decentralized crypto world! Microsoft, a global technology leader, has recognized the innovative spirit and transformative potential of Biokript. Together, we are shaping the future of decentralized finance, revolutionizing the way people interact with digital assets. This partnership is a testament to Biokript's unwavering commitment to excellence, security, and user-centric design. By joining forces with Microsoft, we are equipped with cutting-edge technology, unparalleled expertise, and a shared vision of empowering individuals worldwide. Through this collaboration, we aim to accelerate the adoption of cryptocurrencies, making them more accessible and secure for everyone. Together, we will unlock new possibilities, enhance financial inclusivity, and inspire the next generation of blockchain innovations. Stay tuned for exciting developments, as we leverage the power of Microsoft's vast ecosystem to bring you unparalleled benefits, seamless integration, and a transformative user experience. The future is bright, and together with Microsoft, we will lead the way into a new era of decentralized finance. Biokript extends its deepest gratitude to its dedicated community and partners for your unwavering support on this incredible journey. It is your trust and enthusiasm that drive them to push boundaries, challenge norms, and create a lasting impact in the world of crypto. Thank you!Source: https://twitter.com/biokript/status/1677961040481464323

comments.body: üîä News Update: As-salaam Alaykum! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏èüöÄ Hey BIOKRIPT community.
